alert.note: Alert for Marion; Talbot (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 6:20PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Marion and western Talbot Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 620 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Talbotton, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Talbotton, Woodland, Junction City, Geneva, Marion Estates, Juniper, Baldwinville, Baughville, Olive Branch, Po Biddy Crossroads and Oakland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
